entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Old Crow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:49 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Old Crow Airport 2:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -29.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -32.7°C
Wind: ENE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 27.
